page.title: 15Leisure and Recreation
page.content: We did a survey about how people spend their leisure and recreation time.Most people enjoy watching television.Many people wanted to watch and play sports,but they had to go out of the area for this.There are no sports or leisure centres in the area and many people thought that this was a much needed facility.People like to play bingo but they cannot play locally.Already two social clubs have closed down.The nearest place for playing bingo is the Blaen-y-Maes Community Centre. It can be said that most people wanted improvements made in leisure and recreation facilities in this area.They said they wanted more parks and more places to spend their leisure time.They would also like more youth clubs and more swimming pools.
